Exercise: 1 star, standard (nandb) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Definition} \coqdocvar{nandb} (\coqdocvar{b1} \coqdocvar{b2}: \coqdocvar{bool}) : \coqdocvar{bool} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{match} (\coqdocvar{b1}, \coqdocvar{b2}) \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{2.00em}
\ensuremath{|} (\coqdocvar{true}, \coqdocvar{true}) \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{false}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{2.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{\_} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{true}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_nandb1}: (\coqdocvar{nandb} \coqdocvar{true} \coqdocvar{false}) = \coqdocvar{true}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_nandb2}: (\coqdocvar{nandb} \coqdocvar{false} \coqdocvar{false}) = \coqdocvar{true}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_nandb3}: (\coqdocvar{nandb} \coqdocvar{false} \coqdocvar{true}) = \coqdocvar{true}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_nandb4}: (\coqdocvar{nandb} \coqdocvar{true} \coqdocvar{true}) = \coqdocvar{false}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}

Exercise: 1 star, standard (factorial) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Fixpoint} \coqdocvar{factorial} (\coqdocvar{n}: \coqdocvar{nat}) : \coqdocvar{nat} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdocvar{n} \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{2.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{O} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} 1\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{2.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{S} \coqdocvar{n'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{n} \ensuremath{\times} (\coqdocvar{factorial} \coqdocvar{n'})\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_factorial1}: (\coqdocvar{factorial} 3) = 6.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{test\_factorial2}: (\coqdocvar{factorial} 5) = (\coqdocvar{mult} 10 12).\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}

Exercise: 1 star, standard (plus\_id\_exercise) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Theorem} \coqdocvar{plus\_id\_exercise} : \coqdockw{\ensuremath{\forall}} \coqdocvar{n} \coqdocvar{m} \coqdocvar{o} : \coqdocvar{nat},\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{n} = \coqdocvar{m} \ensuremath{\rightarrow} \coqdocvar{m} = \coqdocvar{o} \ensuremath{\rightarrow}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{n} + \coqdocvar{m} = \coqdocvar{m} + \coqdocvar{o}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}
Exercise: 2 stars, standard (mult\_S\_1) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Theorem} \coqdocvar{mult\_S\_1} : \coqdockw{\ensuremath{\forall}} \coqdocvar{n} \coqdocvar{m} : \coqdocvar{nat},\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{m} = \coqdocvar{S} \coqdocvar{n} \ensuremath{\rightarrow}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{m} \ensuremath{\times} (1 + \coqdocvar{n}) = \coqdocvar{m} \ensuremath{\times} \coqdocvar{m}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}

\coqdockw{\ensuremath{\forall}} (\coqdocvar{b} : \coqdocvar{bool}), \coqdocvar{f} (\coqdocvar{f} \coqdocvar{b}) = \coqdocvar{b}.\coqdoceol

Exercise: 2 stars (andb\_eq\_orb) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Theorem} \coqdocvar{andb\_eq\_orb} : \coqdockw{\ensuremath{\forall}} (\coqdocvar{b} \coqdocvar{c} : \coqdocvar{bool}),\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{andb} \coqdocvar{b} \coqdocvar{c} = \coqdocvar{orb} \coqdocvar{b} \coqdocvar{c} \ensuremath{\rightarrow}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdocvar{b} = \coqdocvar{c}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\end{coqdoccode}
Exercise: 3 stars, standard (binary) \begin{coqdoccode}
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Inductive} \coqdocvar{bin} : \coqdockw{Type} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{Z} : \coqdocvar{bin}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{A} : \coqdocvar{bin} \ensuremath{\rightarrow} \coqdocvar{bin}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{B} : \coqdocvar{bin} \ensuremath{\rightarrow} \coqdocvar{bin}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Fixpoint} \coqdocvar{incr} (\coqdocvar{m} : \coqdocvar{bin}) : \coqdocvar{bin} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdocvar{m} \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{Z} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{Z}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{A} \coqdocvar{m'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{m'}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{m'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{A} (\coqdocvar{incr} \coqdocvar{m'})\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Fixpoint} \coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} (\coqdocvar{m} : \coqdocvar{bin}) : \coqdocvar{nat} :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdocvar{m} \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{Z} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{O}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{A} \coqdocvar{m'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{mult} 2 (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} \coqdocvar{m'})\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{m'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{S} (\coqdocvar{mult} 2 (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} \coqdocvar{m'}))\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{inc\_three\_four}: (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} (\coqdocvar{incr} (\coqdocvar{B} (\coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{Z})))) = 4.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{inc\_nine\_ten}: (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} (\coqdocvar{incr} (\coqdocvar{B} (\coqdocvar{A} (\coqdocvar{A} (\coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{Z})))))) = 10.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{zero\_is\_zero}: (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} \coqdocvar{Z}) = 0.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{five\_is\_five}: (\coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} (\coqdocvar{B} (\coqdocvar{A} (\coqdocvar{B} \coqdocvar{Z})))) = 5.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Fixpoint} \coqdocvar{incN} (\coqdocvar{n} : \coqdocvar{nat}) (\coqdocvar{m} : \coqdocvar{bin})  :=\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{match} \coqdocvar{n} \coqdockw{with}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} 0 \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{m}\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\ensuremath{|} \coqdocvar{S} \coqdocvar{n'} \ensuremath{\Rightarrow} \coqdocvar{incN} \coqdocvar{n'} (\coqdocvar{incr} \coqdocvar{m})\coqdoceol
\coqdocindent{1.00em}
\coqdockw{end}.\coqdoceol
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocemptyline
\coqdocnoindent
\coqdockw{Example} \coqdocvar{SanityCheck}: \coqdocvar{bin\_to\_nat} (\coqdocvar{incN} 15 \coqdocvar{Z}) = 15.\coqdoceol
\end{coqdoccode}
